config.Crops.description: Changes crops and crop-related sell prices.
config.Flowers.description: Changes flowers sell prices and flower seed shop prices. This also affects flower honey.
config.Animals.description: Changes animals sell prices and mechanics of some animals.
config.Fruit Trees.description: Changes fruit trees sell prices and fruit tree sapling shop prices.
config.Mines.description: Changes mines, monsters, artifacts, and geode minerals sell prices.
config.Monster Eradication Goals.descrip: Changes Monster Eradication Goals to require less kills.
config.Item Categories.description: Changes item categories (artisan goods, animal products, etc).
config.Food Buffs.description: Changes food buffs, durations, and edibility.
config.Buildings.description: Buildings that directly affect profits cost more while others cost less.
config.Museum Rewards.description: Changes museum rewards to be in a better order and slightly more rewarding.
config.Shops.description: Changes shop prices, inventories, and limits quantity of some items.
config.Artisan Goods Gain Quantity.descr: Changes artisan goods to have a chance to increase in quantity based on ingredient quality.
config.Quality of Life.description: Willy buys fishing poles, Marnie buys shears & milk pails, Clint buys weapons and armor. Marnie sells Auto-Petter after Community Center completion. Silo holds 750 hay.
config.Stardew Valley Expanded.descripti: Allows the mod to rebalance crops, fish, food, miscellaneous items, and shops from the Stardew Valley Expanded Mod. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings.
config.Ridgeside Village.description: Allows the mod to rebalance fruit trees, fish, food, miscellaneous items, weapons, and shops from the Ridgeside Village Mod. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings.
config.Distant Lands.description: Allows the mod to rebalance crops, fish, and food from the Distant Lands Mod. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings.
config.East Scarp.description: Allows the mod to rebalance crops and fish from the East Scarp Mod. In most cases, you should leave this enabled and use the other settings.
Sheep: Adults can be shorn for wool every couple days. A pair of shears is required to harvest the wool. Lives in the Barn.
